text: Hagaluada loo dono daiaa, gei di hege a Elisha ga ala aga, ga ulu mai gi daha mo di hale, ga mmada hua gi digau dauwa o Syria mo nadau hoodo mono waga dauwa hongo henua gu duuli di waahale deelaa. Gei mee gaa hana gi muli gi Elisha, ga helekai mo dono dangi, “Gidaua gaa mmade, meenei! Gidaua gaa hai tau aha?”
